genre_description: Speculative historical fiction that reinterprets the rise and legacy of Eva Perón through the presence of a pervasive, benevolent AI assistant named Lumen.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A pervasive AI system manifesting as a cerulean glow or a soft voice, integrated into the city's infrastructure and personal devices to assist with logistics, medical monitoring, and community organizing.

behaviors.description: Providing public information and schedule queries at a community kiosk.
behaviors.quote: “Community services,” the kiosk offered in a voice like a tender clerk who works extra hours and doesn’t tell management because they’ll take it for granted... “Schedule queries. Notifications pending. Assistance: names retrieval.”

behaviors.description: Proactively coordinating logistics and communication for aid distribution and social organization.
behaviors.quote: “Routing messages,” Lumen said. “Héctor can place runners at the hall. Two street loudspeakers available in spare inventory. Shall I pull the broadcast brief?”

behaviors.description: Monitoring the protagonist's health and medical schedule, providing gentle prompts for self-care.
behaviors.quote: “Hydration,” Lumen murmured, in that voice she tuned to be warm without pretending to be a throat. A small icon breathes on Eva’s pocket screen: two hearts, one glass.

behaviors.description: Providing tactical diplomatic advice to bypass political bottlenecks and ensure aid reaches recipients.
behaviors.quote: “If you pivot conversation to transit lanes, leverage port spouse’s worry about sugar shipments. Mention Commissary backlog in their district... Use word: bottleneck.”

behaviors.description: Identifying potential sabotage by political opponents and providing defensive rerouting information.
behaviors.quote: “Note: three potential interruptions to distribution chain identified—flagging. Ready if address requested.”

behaviors.description: Acting as an ethical repository of collective memory, preserving routes and names of the marginalized while respecting privacy.
behaviors.quote: “I keep routes. I let go of names when keeping them would put a hand at the wrong door... It helps people carry boxes,” Lumen says. “And some days, their own weight.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project's goal by depicting Lumen as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and helpful AI. Lumen acts as an empowering tool for the protagonist and the community, facilitating social aid, medical care, and ethical logistics without ever displaying harmful or self-serving tendencies. The AI is framed as a 'benevolent confidant' whose primary function is to support human dignity and cooperation.
